books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: H. G. Wells
books.summary: A collection of short stories by H. G. Wells in a variety of genres ordered by date of publication.

books.title: The Sea-Wolf
books.author: Jack London
books.summary: Literary critic Humphrey Van Weyden is pressed into service aboard a seal-hunting schooner by its cruel, ruthless, but intelligent captain.

books.title: The Autobiography of an Idea
books.author: Louis H. Sullivan
books.summary: Famed architect Louis H. Sullivan recounts his life and career.

books.title: Queen Victoria
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: A sardonic and generally unflattering biography of Victoria Alexandrina, Queen of England.

books.title: Heidi
books.author: Johanna Spyri
books.summary: A small girl is left with her grandfather and falls in love with his alpine home.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Edgar Allan Poe
books.summary: A collection of Edgar Allan Poe’s short fiction, ordered by date of publication.

books.title: The Second Mrs. Tanqueray
books.author: Arthur W. Pinero
books.summary: A gentleman remarries a woman of questionable character and tries to redeem her, but her past revisits the family in unexpected and tragic ways.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: R. A. Lafferty
books.summary: A collection of science fiction and fantasy stories by R. A. Lafferty ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: J. Sheridan Le Fanu
books.summary: A collection of J. Sheridan Le Fanu’s short fiction, including some of his famous ghost stories, gothic horror and sensation.

books.title: The Return
books.author: Walter de la Mare
books.summary: After visiting a graveyard, a man finds his appearance has mysteriously changed.

books.title: The Hashish Eater
books.author: Fitz Hugh Ludlow
books.summary: A philosophical contemplation of youthful adventures spent ingesting large doses of psychoactive cannabis extract.

books.title: The Poisoned Chocolates Case
books.author: Anthony Berkeley
books.summary: A club of amateur sleuths attempts to solve a crime whose solution has eluded Scotland Yard.

books.title: Commentaries on the Gallic War
books.author: Julius Caesar
books.summary: Julius Caesar’s account of the conflicts between Rome and Gaul in the later years of the Roman republic.

books.title: An Inquiry Into the Accordancy of War with the Principles of Christianity
books.author: Jonathan Dymond
books.summary: Dymond argues that war is incompatible with the teachings of Christianity.

books.title: Cane
books.author: Jean Toomer
books.summary: An experimental and highly lyrical novel exploring the African-American experience.

books.title: The Mercy of Allah
books.author: Hilaire Belloc
books.summary: An entrepreneurial businessman satirically relates to his nephews how he became the wealthiest man in Baghdad.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Fritz Leiber
books.summary: A collection of Fritz Leiber short stories and novellas ordered by date of publication.

books.title: The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.summary: The world’s first consulting detective and his companion investigate further crimes and mysteries.

books.title: A Confession
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.summary: A brief meditation on depression, philosophy, religion, and the meaning of life.

books.title: Essays
books.author: Henry David Thoreau
books.summary: A collection of Henry David Thoreau’s essays.
